page.title: 18LIFE STYLES..HOME LIFE
page.content: Charlotte Robertson is a 17 year old schoolgirl living in this D-block. She lives on Torr of Forret Farm in a tied cottage. Her father has been a farm worker for over 30 years, her mother is a housewife and her brother works on a nearby farm. A MORNING IN HER LIFE: 7.00 A.M. Gets up and has breakfast. 8.00 A.M. Leaves home to cycle 1/2 mile to her friend's house where she leaves her bike and catches the school bus. 8.45 A.M. Arrives at school. 12.30 P.M. After a typical morning at school Charlotte walks into Cupar for her lunch which consists of a chip roll, a can of lilt and a cream cookie.
